sources.title: American Empire (1942)
sources.description: Richard Dix as Dan Taylor and Preston S. Foster as Paxton Bryce are two longtime friends seeking their fortune in Texas after the war. The two men decide, not without problems, to establish a cattle empire. Paxton becoming too ambitious, distances himself from Dan and Abby, Paxton's wife. It will only be after a personal tragedy that he will come back to his senses. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/american-empire-1942/

sources.title: American Empire
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: American Empire (1942) RICHARD DIX
sources.description:
Stars: Richard Dix, Leo Carrillo, Preston Foster
Director: William C. McGann

When two men join forces to build a cattle empire, they battle rustlers, bad weather and each other.

metadata.Plot: Two men join forces to build a cattle empire, battle rustlers, bad weather and each other.
metadata.Writer: J. Robert Bren, Gladys Atwater, Ben Grauman Kohn
metadata.Actors: Richard Dix, Leo Carrillo, Preston Foster
